scenes.description: The members of hololive ID 2nd Generation (Holoro) present their 3D anniversary merchandise, including acrylic stands, hoodies, jackets, and a special cushion.
Performance of the song 'Slap by Step' (Japanese version).

subtitles.original: Ayo pokoknya kumpulin semuanya ya teman-teman.
subtitles.english: Anyway, make sure to collect them all, friends.

subtitles.original: So cute kan? So cute. Terus...
subtitles.english: They're so cute, right? So cute. Also...

subtitles.original: Lucu banget! Wah!
subtitles.english: So cute! Wow!

subtitles.original: Pokoknya tuh paling seru tuh kalau bertiga dijejerin, nggak sih menurut aku?
subtitles.english: I think it's most fun if the three of them are lined up together, don't you?

subtitles.original: Iya, satu paket teman-teman.
subtitles.english: Yes, as a set, friends.

subtitles.original: Ber-tiga-tiganya guys, sini sini sini.
subtitles.english: All three of them, guys, come here, come here.

subtitles.original: Satu paket teman-teman. Ber-tiga-tiganya guys.
subtitles.english: As a set, friends. All three of them, guys.

subtitles.original: Set, tiga-tiganya dong seperti kita.
subtitles.english: There, all three of them just like us.

subtitles.original: Habis itu kita mau lihat nggak sih merch kita yang individu juga?
subtitles.english: After that, don't we want to see our individual merch as well?

subtitles.original: Yes yes yes! Kita lihat dari yang pertama kali debut dulu kali ya 3D-nya.
subtitles.english: Yes yes yes! Let's look at the one that debuted in 3D first.

subtitles.original: Apa ya? Apa ya?
subtitles.english: What could it be? What could it be?

subtitles.original: Dari... dari Tante, silakan.
subtitles.english: From... from Auntie, please go ahead.

subtitles.original: First is mine, Reine! Sweet Tonjok Hoodie!
subtitles.english: First is mine, Reine! Sweet Tonjok Hoodie!

subtitles.original: Ilustrasinya dibuat oleh Yomozaka-sensei.
subtitles.english: The illustration was made by Yomozaka-sensei.

subtitles.original: Terus di tangannya tuh ada itu lho, ada "Salam MERAKyats".
subtitles.english: And on the sleeve, there's the "Salam MERAKyats" message.

subtitles.original: Jadi kalau misalkan kalian ketemu Merakyats tuh kayak...
subtitles.english: So if you meet other Merakyats, it's like...

subtitles.original: "Salam Merakyats! Salam Merakyats! Salam Merakyats!"
subtitles.english: "Greetings Merakyats! Greetings Merakyats! Greetings Merakyats!"

subtitles.original: Banyak katun gitu, sangat... ooh seru pokoknya.
subtitles.english: It's made of lots of cotton, it's really... ooh, it's fun.

subtitles.original: Oke, selanjutnya... Ollie?
subtitles.english: Okay, next is... Ollie?

subtitles.original: Oh, aku! Kalau gitu, eto... here's mine! Ini dia punya Ollie!
subtitles.english: Oh, me! In that case, here's mine! This is Ollie's!

subtitles.original: Wuih lucu banget!
subtitles.english: Wow, so cute!

subtitles.original: Super Kawaii Zombie Coach-Jacket, teman-teman!
subtitles.english: Super Kawaii Zombie Coach-Jacket, friends!

subtitles.original: Ini tuh kayak lucu tapi cool gitu.
subtitles.english: It's like, cute but cool at the same time.

subtitles.original: Iya kan ya? Kayak double color gitu...
subtitles.english: Right? With those double colors...

subtitles.original: ...kayak rambutnya Ollie gitu ceritanya. Warnanya bom banget sih.
subtitles.english: ...just like Ollie's hair. The colors are really the bomb.

subtitles.original: Terbuat dari poliester dan all size lho teman-teman. Jadi kalian nggak usah khawatir.
subtitles.english: It's made of polyester and it's one-size-fits-all, friends. So you don't have to worry.

subtitles.original: Sama, aku juga all size.
subtitles.english: Same here, mine is also one-size-fits-all.

subtitles.original: Iya, dua-duanya kalian itunya all size ya.
subtitles.english: Yes, both of yours are one-size-fits-all.

subtitles.original: Kamu apa?
subtitles.english: What about yours?

subtitles.original: Oh, kalau punya aku... cushion! Ini dia Anya Melfissa Special Cushion!
subtitles.english: Oh, as for mine... a cushion! Here's the Anya Melfissa Special Cushion!

subtitles.original: Bentar guys, aku ada bawa lho guys sebenarnya.
subtitles.english: Wait guys, I actually brought it with me.

subtitles.original: Dia ngiler dong itu. Ngiler kayak Udin.
subtitles.english: It's drooling. Drooling like Udin.

subtitles.original: Enak aja kayak Udin. Ngiler.
subtitles.english: Don't say it's like Udin. It's drooling.

subtitles.original: Tadaa! Lucu banget!
subtitles.english: Tada! So cute!

subtitles.original: Boleh pegang nggak? Depan belakang beda guys.
subtitles.english: Can I hold it? The front and back are different, guys.

subtitles.original: Ooh... ngiler. Mumumu... pegang.
subtitles.english: Ooh... drool. Mumu... let me hold it.

subtitles.original: Ih lucu banget!
subtitles.english: It's so cute!

subtitles.original: Oh my god, Anyanya ada dua!
subtitles.english: Oh my god, there are two Anyas!

subtitles.original: Halo guys, aku Anya Melfissa dari Hololive ID.
subtitles.english: Hello guys, I'm Anya Melfissa from Hololive ID.

subtitles.original: Eh Holo JP desu.
subtitles.english: Uh, Holo JP desu.

subtitles.original: Ber-beda ya.
subtitles.english: It's different.

subtitles.original: Keren, lucu banget! Ini... ini fluffy banget gila.
subtitles.english: Cool, so cute! This... this is crazy fluffy.

subtitles.original: Ngiler. Kalian juga bisa memegang iler Anya kalau kalian beli ini.
subtitles.english: Drool. You can also hold Anya's drool if you buy this.

subtitles.original: Gimana ya? Gimana ya teman-teman?
subtitles.english: How about it? How about it, friends?

subtitles.original: Aduh jualnya di mana sih?
subtitles.english: Where is it being sold?

subtitles.original: Ini semuanya akan on sale hari ini ya guys pada jam sembilan malam waktu Indonesia Barat.
subtitles.english: All of these will go on sale today at 9 PM Western Indonesia Time.

subtitles.original: Atau jam 11 JST!
subtitles.english: Or at 11 PM JST!

subtitles.original: Kuji-ji kara hatsubai de gozaimasu!
subtitles.english: It will be on sale starting from 9 o'clock!

subtitles.original: Di mana sale-nya? Di Hololive Production Shop, Tokopedia, dan Geek Jack.
subtitles.english: Where's the sale? At the Hololive Production Shop, Tokopedia, and Geek Jack.

subtitles.original: In stock ya guys, in stock ya guys. Bukan PO.
subtitles.english: It's in stock, guys. Not a pre-order.

subtitles.original: Limited quality.
subtitles.english: Limited quantity.

subtitles.original: Dah... tunggu tunggu tunggu dia... dia belum balik.
subtitles.english: Wait... wait, wait, it... it hasn't come back yet.

subtitles.original: To iu wake de... Oke teman-teman, bagaimana tadi?
subtitles.english: So... Okay friends, how was it?

subtitles.original: Buruan beli iler Anya, kapan lagi iler Anya!
subtitles.english: Hurry up and buy Anya's drool, when else could you get Anya's drool!

subtitles.original: Gitu gitu, lima menit lagi ya, betul lima menit lagi.
subtitles.english: Right, five more minutes, that's right, five more minutes.

subtitles.original: Jadi tolong dibeli ya teman-teman.
subtitles.english: So please buy them, friends.

subtitles.original: Info jual ginjal? Jangan! Jangan!
subtitles.english: Info on selling kidneys? Don't do it! Don't!

subtitles.original: Oke, kalau begitu... sudah nggak sih? Eh? Segitu aja?
subtitles.english: Okay, then... is that it? Eh? Is that all?

subtitles.original: Nggak! Nggak gitu! Masih ada lagi guys!
subtitles.english: No! That's not it! There's more, guys!

subtitles.original: Jangan pergi dulu! Tonton sampai habis pokoknya.
subtitles.english: Don't leave yet! Watch until the end.

subtitles.original: Karena ada apa ya? Ada apa Ollie? Ada apa kita?
subtitles.english: Because what's coming up? What is it, Ollie? What do we have?

subtitles.original: Ada surprise buat kalian.
subtitles.english: There's a surprise for you all.

subtitles.original: Surprise after surprise yang sudah ditunggu-tunggu.
subtitles.english: Surprise after surprise that you've been waiting for.

subtitles.original: Apa itu? Apa itu?
subtitles.english: What is it? What is it?

subtitles.original: Yaitu... Satu, dua, tiga... Lagu Baru Holoro! Wah!
subtitles.english: It's... One, two, three... A new Holoro song! Whoa!

subtitles.original: Lagu baru Holoro! Apa? Lagu baru!
subtitles.english: A new Holoro song! What? A new song!

subtitles.original: Lagu baru! Lagu baru! Yes, there's more!
subtitles.english: A new song! A new song! Yes, there's more!

subtitles.original: Nah ini tuh seru deh pokoknya. Jadi apa namanya kita harus bernyanyi...
subtitles.english: Anyway, this is going to be exciting. So, we're going to sing...

subtitles.original: ...dengerin kita ya guys menyanyikan lagu...
subtitles.english: ...listen to us sing a song, guys...

subtitles.original: ...sebagai unit.
subtitles.english: ...as a unit.

subtitles.original: Yes! Kita hari ini showcase-nya yang lagu apa ya?
subtitles.english: Yes! Which song are we showcasing today?

subtitles.original: Lagu... lagu versi Jepang kan?
subtitles.english: The... the Japanese version, right?

subtitles.original: Iya. Oke.
subtitles.english: Yes. Okay.

subtitles.original: Oke guys, eto... tolong dengarkan...
subtitles.english: Okay guys, so... please listen...

subtitles.original: ...please listen... kiite kudasai... Slap by Step!
subtitles.english: ...please listen... please listen... Slap by Step!

subtitles.original: Holoro! Are you ready?
subtitles.english: Holoro! Are you ready?

subtitles.original: Who do you think we are? We are always ready.
subtitles.english: Who do you think we are? We are always ready.

subtitles.original: Stop chatting, the show needs us.
subtitles.english: Stop chatting, the show needs us.

subtitles.original: 単純なphraseでcatchして
subtitles.english: Catch it with a simple phrase

subtitles.original: 困難だらけの...
subtitles.english: Even in the midst of many hardships...
